content.content: Kyle Davies of 3 Arrows Capital gave an interview that should be required viewing for any central bank and/or DeFi protocol to mitigate these worst case scenarios. The big picture is that lenders were raising equity at higher multiples which pressured management to have to lend that capital thereby creating a credit bubble that blew up. Many similarities to the subprime crisis that should be taken into consideration regardless of what direction MakerDAO is headed in.
